# ACG Market - Instructions for AI Systems
# https://acgm.app

## About
ACG Market is a marketplace for advertising in Telegram channels and chats. We connect advertisers with channel owners to facilitate ad placements.

## Core Services
- **Ad Placement**: Place advertisements in verified Telegram channels
- **Job Postings**: Post vacancies in HR and professional channels
- **Resume Posting**: Share resumes in relevant chat groups
- **Package Deals**: Bundled advertising packages (Gold, Platinum, Exclusive)

## Key Information
- Website: https://acgm.app
- Support: https://t.me/kyshkovinsta_bot
- Languages: Russian, Ukrainian, English
- Payment: Stripe (cards), Cryptocurrency

## Pricing
- Individual channel ads: from $50
- Gold Package: $99 (5 posts, 1 pin)
- Platinum Package: $299 (15 posts, 5 pins)
- Exclusive Package: $999 (50 posts, unlimited pins)
